projects.title: Graduation Project - Smart Meter
projects.description: A smart meter module ready to be mounted pre
features: Developed an innovative IoT-based application enabling consumers to monitor and manage household energy consumption
Enabled real-time monitoring and control of household energy consumption through a mobile application.
Integrated the system with a Firebase real-time database via a Wi-Fi module for continuous data storage and retrieval.
Implemented multiple operational modes to optimize energy efficiency
Developed a user-friendly app interface for tracking individual appliance consumption and managing operational modes to optimize energy use

projects.title: campgrounds-website
projects.description: A website which contains campgrounds in US with reviews
features: Built a dynamic web application with MongoDB, Express, and Node.js for managing campground listings.
Integrated database functionality to store campground names, images, and user-submitted reviews.
Implemented user authentication and authorization for secure access to review and edit features.
Added basic front-end styling for a clean and usable interface.

projects.title: E-commerce WebsiteE-commerce Website
projects.description: An ecommerce website that's flexable with multipages navigation and uses responsive design.
features: Developed a multi-page website for a simulated online store using vanilla HTML and CSS.
Designed and styled multiple product, cart, and home pages to enhance user experience.
Focused on responsive layout and clean, intuitive navigation.
